product_name: Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt - Men's
long_description: Featuring a relaxed fit and reliable protection from UV rays, the men's Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt can help you stay comfortable and extend your great times in the water. Perfect for those who prefer a loose fit, the Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt keeps you comfortable whether it's wet or dry. UPF 50+ sun protection with quick-drying fabric is comfortable and soft against your skin. Small loop at the hem prevents the shirt from riding up when connected to board short laces (board shorts not included). Flatlock stitching prevents chafing.
short_description: Featuring a relaxed fit and reliable protection from UV rays, the men's Quiksilver Off The Wall 2 Surf Shirt can help you stay comfortable and extend your great times in the water.
